channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Advantech iView
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Advantech iView

item.title: CVE-2023-3983|2023-07-31T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- advantech%20iview
item.description: An authenticated SQL injection vulnerability exists in Advantech iView versions prior to v5.7.4 build 6752. An authenticated remote attacker can bypass checks in com.imc.iview.utils.CUtils.checkSQLInjection() to perform blind SQL injection.
